attributes.title: TRUMO COULD GO EAT SH!T
attributes.review: You are trying to take TikTok down but guess what you app is going down with it! Us tik tiktokers all f$&*ng HATE YOU    HOPE YOU GO EAT DOG SH!T OH WAIT YOU ARE DOG SH!T😄🤬

attributes.title: Made my phone crash
attributes.review: I down loaded this app to help myself be informed about our dear presidents campaign and upon downloading this app my phone crashed and after trying to restart it several times and finally after throwing it at the wall it’s turned back on.  I have now lost all of my beautiful pictures of poop collages 😭. My turkey videos are gone as well and pretty much everything I’ve ever had on this phone is gone.  I’ve worked so hard on them and now they are all gone! Not only that but the app will not open. I’ve essentially lost all that is important to me all because I wanted to be apart of the trump train 😭😭😭. If you value your phone and memory’s, do not download this app, I should have known when I saw the ratings.

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible. -100/10.
attributes.review: I downloaded the app for more information on rallies that trump has scheduled. The app took all day to download, and when it finally did I tried to open the app and it crashed. This continued to happen every time I opened the app. Three days go by and I finally get the app to open but it’s so unorganized that I can’t even figure out what’s going on or what I’m looking at. It’s EXTREMELY hard to navigate. I ended up just deleting it because of sheer frustration and being fed up with trying to get the app to cooperate. It also took up a LOT of storage so don’t download it if phone storage is something you already struggle with. I want to say I’m disappointed but in all honesty I’m not surprised.

attributes.title: He tried but app is horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded trump 2020 because I believe in his ability to make America great again. But this app is a complete utter mess my phone keeps crashing every time I have opened the app more then 2 minutes, my phone has 10 viruses due to this awful app. I think apple store should take this down because it is a threat to my home life I have been getting text messages form giving my phone number to the app saying “ they will kill me and take all of my money” I have went to the police countless of times but they insist on it’s just a stupid prank. PLEASE FOR THE SAKE OF YOUR LIFE AND FAMILIES DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.also I believe this app is a sponsored by a terrorist organization

attributes.title: AHHHH!
attributes.review:
Now, this is a story all about how
My life got flipped-turned upside down
And I'd like to take a minute
Just sit right there
I'll tell you how I became the prince of a town called Bel Air
In west Philadelphia born and raised
On the playground was where I spent most of my days
Chillin' out maxin' relaxin' all cool
And all shootin some b-ball outside of the school
When a couple of guys who were up to no good
Started making trouble in my neighborhood
I got in one little fight and my mom got scared
She said 'You're movin' with your auntie and uncle in Bel Air'
I begged and pleaded with her day after day
But she packed my suit case and sent me on my way
She gave me a kiss and then she gave me my ticket.
I put my Walkman on and said, 'I might as well kick it'.
First class, yo this is bad
Drinking orange juice out of a champagne glass.
Is this what the people of Bel-Air living like?
Hmm this might be alright.
But wait I hear they're prissy, bourgeois, all that
Is this the type of place that they just send this cool cat?
I don't think so
I'll see when I get there
I hope they're prepared for the prince of Bel-Air
Well, the plane landed and when I came out
There was a dude who looked like a cop standing there with my name out
I ain't trying to get arrested yet
I just got here
I sprang with the quickness like lightning, disappeared
I whistled for a cab and when it came near
The license plate said fresh and it had dice in the mirror
If anything I could say that this cab was rare
But I thought 'Nah, forget it' - 'Yo, homes to Bel Air'
I pulled up to the house about seven or eigth
And I yelled to the cabbie 'Yo homes smell ya later'
I looked at my kingdom
I was finally there
To sit on my throne as the Prince of Bel Air

StOrYTiME ✨

So like first of all I wanted to see what all the hype was about so I downloaded this app😍 i figured I could give Donald Trump a chance 🤮sike you really thought. Anyways this app took more that 48 hours to download😒. I downloaded a different app the same day and it took like 2 seconds not 48 hours 😡. Anyways once it was downloaded I tried to open the app and it kept crashing🤨 like Id open it for like 1 second and my whole screen would go black and my phone would turn off 😣. The app also hacked my phone I had memes of Donald Trump and his wife 🙂 but as soon as I downloaded the app all those memes were gone🙁. We don’t Stan Donald Trump 👊🏽. Also I really wanna know who made this app. The quality is not it 🤮 like a whole 4 year old created this app. The fonts are sucky and everything was looking like a whole android 🤓Another thing when I was trying to delete the app🤦🏻‍♀️, my phone glitched and it took me to a site on safari🤔the whole site was 10 reasons why to vote for Donald J Trump. 😑Oh hell no you really thing you could trick people not me you don’t deserve no vote 🖕🏽. Why did people give this hype this app is trash  0/10 DONT GET THIS to WACK APP 🤢. K thank you bye 👋🏽. P.S this was all for my lord and savior tt🥰

attributes.title: Eating hand sanitizer✨🧚😙
attributes.review: No❤️. I downloaded this app yesterday and lemme tell you I like to eat oranges. Now I hate them. I went to the White House to go ask trump if he was still made at me for buying a ticket to his campaign thingy and not even showing up. He walked down to the gates and didn’t even let me in. I know RUDE... anyways I went back home and then I started to get random texts saying that they could see me and that they would ban my account off of tiktok (milani.ward) BUT OF COURSE I COULD NOT LET THAT HAPPEN☺️ so I told him I’d make sure that nobody ever showed up to his campaigns rallies ANYTHING if he did. Guess what? This man had the giant ORANGE 🍊 audacity to still ban my account😔 but that’s what multiple emails are for am I right? 😚 I was thinking of how gen z is so strong so I was thinking maybe we call news channels that support trump and let them know GEN Z has won but I’m a holy child... SIKE. STAN CHARLIE FOR CLEAR SKIN AND #CHARLIEFORPRES🤩✨anyways I started eating grapefruit I instead they taste good they’re pretty pink on the I side😌. THEN I heard a knock on my door. IT WAS ORANGE and he was tying me to a pole and throwing oranges at me. HE EVEN THREWW A GRAPEFRUITTTT😭 what Am I supposed to eat now😣 any ways trump thought you should know that that was rude of you to do that to me in my dream. Sad how Obama is gone and no longer pres😓. Have a nice day and DONT YOU EVER TRY AND DESTROY TIKTOK😚😚💞❤️✨🧚.

attributes.title: DONT LIKE IT
attributes.review: It toke 1 week to download. If it take that long DONT GET IT. Also it crashed my phone so Trump should be the one buying my new phone cause it was from his app that destroyed it.DONT GET HTIS BAD
